text: Langet ngon bumoe dum pujoe Allah Ucap teuseubeh ban tujoh langet Bumoe pih meuhat hana meuubah Dum asoe langet ngon asoe bumoe Teuseubeh pujoe bandum keu Allah Tapi gata dum hana tateupue Teuseubeh jihnyoe han jeut tapeugah Keubit cit Tuhan kalim Neuh that-that Peungampon that-that keu hamba Allah
